data.title: Decent breakfast specials for a good price
data.text: I had a great omelette breakfast special. I love the cheese omelettes here. The rye toast with butter is delicious. The breakfast special comes with a tea or coffee and small juice. Great value for the money.

data.title: Easter Dinner
data.text: A great place with sensible prices, great food and friendly attentive staff. A Bayonne staple for many years. Good Family Restaurant! Everything on menu is good!

data.title: Great food great price
data.text:
As diners go this one is tops..... from the food to the price  "you can't beat it"
 Always warm and friendly.. Of all the years I've been going there I've never been disappointed...

data.title: A place to get any kind of fun food
data.text:
I come here on a day when I am just tired of the same home made food.
Here you can get anything off the menu and not be happy.
Staff is great!
Nice area people!
Great prices!
Great location!

data.title: Okay, but there are better choices
data.text: The Lighthouse is a diner in midtown Bayonne. The food is at best average. My entree was disappointing, though the side dishes were fine. The desserts are good. I've never been there for breakfast, so it's possible that it might be better for breakfast. Service was okay. Personally, I think the Broadway diner is a better choice, unless you are going just for dessert.

data.title: Really?
data.text: Ok the only reason they got two stars from me was because their food was not that bad...  Not amazing, but not that bad. Although I did order a panini which looked amazing on their menu and they also claimed that they use an authentic English press for their panini...  It says it right on their menu. What I got was two piece of flat bread that was toasted yet soggy from the eight lbs of cheese that was all over my plate. Our secretary had gone over to place our order on this day and was told that she could not order a kids chicken tender meal! The lady Maria really would not give us a kids chicken tender meal...  Maybe they should have realized with our $70 order that there might be some children eating!!!!? We have a business nearby and probably will never order from here again knowing that this is how they handle their business. Such a shame. I have included in my review a picture of the panini I got. So sad compared to their menu picture.

data.title: Good Diner
data.text: The lighthouse is a diner. Good food for the money. Always crowded which i guess it's good. Definitely a family type of place. Very noisy.

data.title: Many options for your meal
data.text: Co worker had meatloaf dinner he loved it. Corn on the cob came with looked over cooked. I had a eggplant dish with mushrooms feta over noodles with marinara. Sauce was very sweet, penne was over cooked and falling apart. There were many choices on there large menu. The alcohol portion I felt was overpriced. I will give them another chance. It just will not be pasta or marinara.
